page.title: 12LOCAL EMPLOYMENT 4
page.content: J.E. Staceys a building supplier was founded by Edgar James Stacey. Originally it was S.Parsons in 1895, becoming Staceys in 1929 employing 12 people. They work in carpentry, joinery and painting/decorating.The business today has grown to employ 153 people in building,plumbing and other building concerns, they also are undertakers. Recently Tamer Trading has taken over the retail business which sells all building equipment & materials and hire of equipment. The main qualification for the workers is enthusiasum. A 2 year apprentiship is normal for young workers. Their supplies come from all over the country. Their hardwoods come from foriegn countries imported to Liverpool or Oxford via port traders. The company is a private limited company with a director & shareholders
